column2: World War Hulk: Aftersmash! - Damage Control (2008) #3
column6:
The newly-sentient Chrysler Building is sick of the rat race and planning to leave the city. Can Damage Control convince the Art Deco treasure that New York is its home? ,2008,3
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
